about_the_game:
Explore the enchanting world of Roguebook over 50 pages of sketches and original illustrations that reveal the unique vision of the artists behind the game.

This digital artbook transports you to the magical lands of Roguebook, a game set in the extended universe of Faeria. From initial sketch to final illustration, explore the characters, environments and bestiary of the game.

To view the digital artbook:
1. Right click on Roguebook in your Steam library
2. Select Properties > Local files > Browse
3. Open the folder ''Artbook''
